name: TESTS
description:
While Unity loads the game, read the exposition below:

You are a new recruit hacker for the company GOOD INC. Your boss has told you that the opposing company MALICE CO is hosting viruses on their servers, and you need to shut them down. If you take the servers down, you keep your job. If you don't...

TESTS is a Warioware-style game where you're tasked with hacking into another company's computer, but they have a very... odd... way of locking down files. Venture deeper and deeper into the files of your rival company's terminal and discover the story of the two companies along the way!

My submission for Ludum Dare 48.
